# Introduction to RDiversity package

This is a minimal example of the `RDiversity` package. 

```{r set_parameters, results='hide'} 
# Simulate and plot phylogeny
tree <- ape::rtree(n = 10)
plot(tree, edge.width = 2)
str(tree)
```

Calculate aslkdjas
